flawed_nl_solution:
There were 1150-150=<<1150-150=10000>>10000 people who didn't vote for John
That means James got 10000*0.7=<<10000*0.7=7000>>7000 votes
So the other candidate got 10000-7000=<<10000-7000=3000>>3000 votes
This means he got 3000-150=<<3000-150=2850>>2850 more votes than John.
#### 2850

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 1000, not 10000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
